law.catch_line: Renewal fees suspended for persons in Armed Forces.
law.text: All persons who are required to pay renewal fees to the board as registered pharmacists shall not be required to pay such fees during the time such persons are actively serving in the Armed Forces of the United States.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 257, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 221, sec. 8. -- Created 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 2.
